name: Blue Dream
description: Blue Dream balances full-body relaxation with gentle cerebral invigoration. Novice and veteran consumers alike enjoy the level effects of Blue Dream, which ease you gently into a calm euphoria.

name: Sour Diesel
description: Sour Diesel, also known as Sour D, is a fast-acting strain that delivers energizing, dreamy cerebral effects that have pushed Sour Diesel to its legendary status.

name: Granddaddy Purple
description: Introduced in 2003 by Ken Estes, Granddaddy Purple (or GDP) is a famous Indica cross of Purple Urkle and Big Bud. This California staple inherits a complex grape and berry aroma from its Purple Urkle parent.

name: Green Crack
description: Don’t let the name fool you: this is pure cannabis. Few strains compare to Green Crack’s sharp energy and focus as it induces an invigorating mental buzz that keeps you going throughout the day.

name: OG Kush
description: OG Kush was first cultivated in Florida, in the early ‘90s when a strain from Northern California was crossed with a Hindu Kush plant from Amsterdam. The result was a hybrid with a unique terpene profile.

name: GARY PAYTON
description: Gary Payton, named after the famous NBA player, is known for its potent effects, unique flavor profile, and impressive lineage.
